RelationalDatabase

Class FunctionalDependency

  • java.lang.Object
    • RelationalDatabase.FunctionalDependency

  • public class FunctionalDependency
extends java.lang.Object
    The FunctionalDependency class represents a functional dependency of a relation along with it's Normal Form property.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String funcdep
      The input string provided for the functional dependency.
      private int normalForm
      The normal form of the functional dependency with respect to the relation.
      private Relation relation
      The relation to which the funcional dependency belongs to.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Attribute> x
      The attributes which can infer other attributes.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Attribute> y
      The attributes which are inferred by other attributes.
